a1: All common image formats are supported including JPEG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP, and SVG.
q2: How many colors can be extracted?
a2: You can extract between 3 and 10 dominant colors from any image using the adjustable slider.
q3: How does the color extraction work?
a3: We use a k-means clustering algorithm on the image pixels to identify groups of similar colors and find the most representative dominant colors.
a4: Yes, all processing happens in your browser using the HTML5 Canvas API. Your images are never uploaded to any server.
q5: Can I copy the extracted colors?
a5: Yes, you can copy individual hex codes by clicking on them, or copy all colors at once with the Copy All button.
